text: Oderolal railway station (, ) is located in Oderolal village, Matiari district of Sindh province of the Pakistan. ==See also== * List of railway stations in Pakistan * Pakistan Railways ==References== ==External links== * Official Web Site of Pakistan Railways Category:Railway stations in Matiari District Category:Railway stations on Karachi–Peshawar Line (ML 1)
title: Oderolal railway station
